title: OWC Aura Pro X2 ssd cant install osx
message:
got this ssd
[URL="https://eshop.macsales.com/shop/ssd/owc/macbook-pro-retina-display/2013-2014-2015"]https://eshop.macsales.com/shop/ssd/...2013-2014-2015[/URL]

before i installed two of this in macbook air without problems

now i have the 240gb ssd, with A1502 macbook 2015, the original ssd is dead, i have another apple ssd and that works fine so the laptop is good

when i install this OWC ssd, start osx 10.13.6 installer, it sees the SSD, i can format it, than i start installation, after like 5 min it goes back to the installer menu

with our Apple SSD i was running hte laptop for few hours and did the update, as i know the laptop needs EFI upgrade from 10.13, so that should be done, but still cant install osx, 10.11 doesnt even see the SSD, and i have an usb enclosure, which works for sure with apple SSD, macbook doesnt see the OWC SSD in the enclosure

title: OWC Aura Pro X2 ssd cant install osx
message: well, yesterday i left it run with an apple ssd, overnight, and now it seems to be installing, maybe it needed that much time to update the EFI in the macbook?

title: OWC Aura Pro X2 ssd cant install osx
message: ok, now it worked, leaving the macbook overnight on with 10.13.6 did the trick, i thought updating the EFI is faster process
